LIMBO_2_PROJECT_DESC: We could give an extinct species of ancient aliens a second chance at life by uploading their neural scans to robotic bodies.
GHOST_SHIP_PROJECT_DESC: An abandoned science vessel is caught in a centuries-long patrol of the Hillos system. What lies at the heart of this lonely odyssey?
GHOST_SHIP_PROJECT_02_DESC: The psionic chatter detected in the Hillos system appears to belong to the artificial consciousness trapped aboard the 'ghost ship' Ubume.
ANCIENT_MANUFACTORIUM_PROJECT_DESC: Now, after all the preparations we've made, it's time for us to get all this machinery up and running, connect the facility to the planetary power grid!
